data.title: Washington, DC Downtown
data.meta_description: Morton's The Steakhouse is located on Connecticut Ave in Downtown Washington D.C.. Featuring the best steak anywhere! Join us for dinner! View menu
data.meta_site_name: Morton's The Steakhouse | Chain of steak restaurants with locations in the United States and franchised abroad, founded in Chicago in 1978

Your Table Is Waiting

The patio at the Connecticut Avenue location overlooks Washington's infamous K Street Corridor, while the dining room caters to DC's powerful elite. Mingle amongst the decision-makers of DC, indulging in Morton's legendary steakhouse favorites for lunch or dinner. On weekends relax with locals who have loved the location for over 25 years.

General Manager: Todd Bricker

Proper attire is required. View our dress code here.
